trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Bethlehem
There were no other sightings in Bethlehem on or around August 9th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi got out of my bed room about 4 :13 am and wanted a smoke , i usually like to stargaze to see if i can see anything unusual , and tonight i sis it was a glowing bright diamond in the sky traveling from southwest to northeast , i know airplanes don't travel that route , i have no clue to what the object was way to bright to be an airplane and had no blinking lights, i was kinda mad at myself that i did not have a camera or any type of recording device as video would have been the most sufficient, it stayed in the night sky for about a minute til i lost sight over a tree line , i suppose it was about 20,000 feet and traveling around 1,000mph or more
